name: Mens Blue T-Shirt
description: Designed to be flattering on your physique, Fuaark Apex T-shirts are perfect for your most challenging workouts. Light weight fabric with elastane blend keep its shape wear after wear. This trendy/stylish casual T shirts for men is designed in a way that it is ideal for running, jogging, gym wear, yoga as the fabric fits perfectly to your body and stretches according to your moments. This stylish gym wear t shirt is absorbent and made of polyester which makes it stretchable and gives you comfort and ease of movements like GYM, CRICKET, RUNNING,OTHER SPORTS. Crafted with stretch fabric, it offers a trendy look yet are durable for all your training needs. The best in class, polyester Slim fit round neck half sleeve, multi-purpose t-shirts. Great to wear at gym, sports club, family reunion, picnic or parties.

name: Mens Black T-Shirt
description: Comfort and Style.This multi purpose T-shirt is made with Dry fit material with sweat-absorbent technology.
